article_title: Many Good Ideas, But Some Missed Opportunities

article_metadata.description: The reason why the health care systems of developed countries are so dysfunctional is that most of the time patients are not spending their own money; they are spending someone else’s money. That means when they spend a dollar on health care, they have no incentive to ensure that they [...]
